comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: From 3 June 1903 to 26 July 1903 she served briefly as flagship of the European Squadron while on a cruise that took her first to Kiel, Germany. She was visited by the German Emperor 25 June 1903 and by the Prince of Wales 13 July. She returned to Bar Harbor, Maine, 26 July 1903 and resumed duties as flagship of the North Atlantic Fleet. from the US navy Public affairs web pages www.chinfo.navy.mil/navpalib/ships/battleships/kearsarge/...
